response.overview: Driven by an instinctive pull, Xavier, the Alpha of a rogue wolf pack, senses the emergence of his fated mate. Tracing this profound connection, he finds Dr. Isla, an Omega. Captivated by her unique blend of gentleness and resilience, Xavier is determined to claim her. However, Isla believes her destined partner is another. This sparks intense rivalry as Xavier relentlessly pursues her. Initially wary and misunderstanding Xavier's motives, Isla gradually comes to understand the complex male beneath the Alpha exterior. Their journey unfolds into a thrilling and passionate romance. Yet, their burgeoning bond faces relentless trials: treacherous internal pack politics and looming external threats. Ultimately, through shared peril and unwavering resolve, they overcome every obstacle, their love culminating in a lasting union.
response.title: Wanted by the Rogue Alpha
